comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: Skystream was a pioneer in downtown to downtown air service, Chicago-Detroit.  This airport was indeed right next to downtown, but Detroit's "downtown" airport was some distance from the city center.  Meigs later closed, so even an updated view is no longer possible.  I. E. Quastler, the photographer.

comment.author: 39827348@N05
comment._content: Very sad about Meigs. The closing was a big mistake..
